official-title.#text:
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4438) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to
			 simplify and make permanent the research credit.

committee-name.#tail:
, reported the following resolution; which was referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be
			 printed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Research and Competitiveness Act of 2014

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to simplify and make
			 permanent the research credit. All points of order against consideration
			 of the bill are waived. The amendment in the nature of a substitute
			 recommended by the

now printed in the bill
			 shall be considered as adopted. The bill, as amended, shall be considered
			 as read. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended,
			 are waived. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the
			 bill, as amended, and on any amendment thereto to final passage without
			 intervening motion except: (1) 90 minutes of debate equally divided and
			 controlled by the chair and ranking minority member of the

; and (2) one motion to recommit with or without
			 instructions.

text.#text: That upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider in the
